acceptance-test-run.title: Memoization should work correctly for collections and arrays
acceptance-test-run.name: memoizationShouldWorkCorrectlyForCollectionsAndArrays

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.MemoizationPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type EBxGh_C4oe
Then the collection should have exactly cE8VB0HkXI elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type zkR3cJCJll
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type J7v4zIHKXy=MFLA06j27N and value of type 1CeOlO0u9E=7cUJ0PYrEZ
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
